name: Hearing Along the River During Qingming Festival
name_original: Hearing Along the River During Qingming Festival
description:
Hearing Along the River During Qingming Festival

What is this:

This piece is made for CTCS 505. You will hear sound according to your mouse position in this famous ancient painting.

Control:

press "A" and "D" (or left/right arrowkey) to move the map

press "Shift" while moving the map to move it faster

move your mouse.

(it's recommended to move your mouse slowly)

Here are some links if you want to learn about this painting:

https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Along_the_River_During_the_Qingming_Festival

https://www.comuseum.com/painting/famous-chinese-paintings/along-the-river-during-the-qingming-festival/#

this version is still at the early stage of this project, so the black block is the end. There are not plenty of different sounds either.

I tried to upload an H5 version so you can play on this page, but it turns out H5 is too bad on multi-audio playing to give you a normal experience. So here's only a build for windows.

Hope you enjoy!
